author: Francis Mascarenhas
title: Life under lockdown in India's massive Dharavi slum
description: In homes that are cramped, stuffy and increasingly low on food, residents of Mumbai's huge Dharavi slum are struggling under India's nationwide lockdown.
content:
MUMBAI (Reuters) - In homes that are cramped, stuffy and increasingly low on food, residents of Mumbai’s huge Dharavi slum are struggling under India’s nationwide lockdown. 
In Dharavi, where an estimated one million people live, residents are stretching out… [+2333 chars]
